verses.name: Ezekiel 15:1
verses.text: And the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,

verses.name: Ezekiel 15:2
verses.text: Son of man, What is the vine tree more than any tree, or than a branch which is among the trees of the forest?

verses.name: Ezekiel 15:3
verses.text: Shall wood be taken thereof to do any work? or will men take a pin of it to hang any vessel thereon?

verses.name: Ezekiel 15:4
verses.text: Behold, it is cast into the fire for fuel; the fire devoureth both the ends of it, and the midst of it is burned. Is it meet for any work?

verses.name: Ezekiel 15:5
verses.text: Behold, when it was whole, it was meet for no work: how much less shall it be meet yet for any work, when the fire hath devoured it, and it is burned?

verses.name: Ezekiel 15:6
verses.text: Therefore thus saith the Lord God; As the vine tree among the trees of the forest, which I have given to the fire for fuel, so will I give the inhabitants of Jerusalem.

verses.name: Ezekiel 15:7
verses.text: And I will set my face against them; they shall go out from one fire, and another fire shall devour them; and ye shall know that I am the Lord, when I set my face against them.

verses.name: Ezekiel 15:8
verses.text: And I will make the land desolate, because they have committed a trespass, saith the Lord God.
